DOC.brief_title: Automated UltraSound Software Identification Lumbar Vertebral Levels
DOC.detailed_description: The use ultrasound one accurate way identify correct vertebral level needle insertion spinal/epidural anesthetic , however commonly use . A novel automate ultrasound software system develop UBC Department Engineering identifies practitioner intervertebral space lumbar area . This study aim investigate whether new technology great accuracy identify intervertebral space manual palpation .
DOC.criteria: ASA I II ≥ 19 year old Term pregnancy ( ≥ 37 week gestation age ) Scheduled elective Cesarean section Ability read English order understand consent form Patient refusal participate BMI ≥ 40 Scoliosis Previous low back surgery know spinal abnormality Inability palpate bony landmark lumbar region Active labour ( cervical dilatation > 5cm ) Allergy epidural tape , surgical paper tape , felt pen
